title: [Large-Scale] Collaborative Entrepreneurship Development Program: Team-Based Entrepreneurial Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of business concepts and proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: Modular design considering smartphone-centric accessibility and team collaboration learning.

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with team members to concretize entrepreneurial ideas for solving social issues within six weeks.
Learners can improve peer collaboration through three or more feedback sessions during the team project period.
Learners can submit a team-based business plan (smartphone-recorded video or document) with over 80% completeness in the final assessment.

resources: Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Docs Mobile Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
